title: participant
description: Describes the participant involved in the recording session, including demographic and contextual information relevant to behavioural and cognitive analysis.

participantId.description: Unique identifier for the participant (anonymised if required).

ageYears.description: Age of participant at time of recording, in years.

visionStatus.description: Vision capability during recording (e.g., normal, wearing glasses).

clinicalConditions.description: Optional list of relevant diagnoses, neurodivergent traits, or conditions (e.g., ADHD, ASD, stroke).

notes.description: Freeform notes or anonymised comments relevant to participant context.

extensions.description: Custom extension fields for future compatibility.
